Name: 雪策边境-BSP
About the game: the first chapter of xuece border - this product is developed by Chongqing Juxin Technology Co., Ltd. please respect the labor achievements and play friendly games. thank you! the first chapter of xuece border is the shooting game of post-modern war type, which is rich in (stronghold capture) (Allied explosion) (death competition) (traditional competition mode) (big escape) [/] [/] the current game version is: 1.0.0.0. communication: 294953571 [/] [/] [/] [/] site occupation mode: [/] 1. Denger bank Players can choose freely from two camps: allies and rebels. In 2034, they will compete for strongholds on the oil beach on denger bank. The Allies collect resources to produce evolutionary technology, while the rebels want to collect oil from the banks of dengue Research and development of weapons of mass destruction. The two armies engaged in a fierce fight. You will play a part in the game (rebel / Allied) in this war. The mode of taking denger'an as a stronghold Features: as an allied / rebel, it can control the electromagnetic gun on denger bank and attack the Allied / rebel ships to win. 2. Darcy town Not far from Tengger shore, there is an abandoned town where some conflicts broke out. Players can play (rebel / Allied) to join the conflict and solve the conflict. This is the team death competition mode 3. Ste mining Not far from Darcy Town, a mining company named ste was once wanted to capture by the local rebels who stored ore raw materials. The Allies rushed to guard the properties of ste mining and organized the rebels to study ore raw materials as weapons of mass destruction. We can't use thermal weapons here, which will ignite some mineral materials This mode is a cold weapon competition mode Features: Allied / rebel forces can obtain economic rewards by collecting mineral materials in the map. 4. Ste processing plant Not far away from the ore materials stored in the mining industry, is the processing plant of the mining company, where you can process minerals into various rare metals. The allies, as a symbol of justice, are preventing the rebels from seizing the mining warehouse in St from controlling the largest mineral processing plant on the planet. If the rebels can't capture the processing plant, they will use high explosives to destroy the largest mineral processing plant on the planet. The Allies paid a huge price for it. This mode is blasting mode Features: for example, players playing the rebel camp will carry a C4 on each rebel. For example, players in the Allied camp will be equipped with saboteurs to prevent the rebels from destroying the factory. Plot mode: 1: Recovery Protagonist ESP awakes from lab training (to be deciphered) Background: Protagonist: ESP special soldier (modified for strengthening exoskeleton) Chapter 1: ` ` ` ` ` ` (to be decrypted) Thank you for your support! We will do better! Bring you a better experience!
